title: Cumberland Gap National Historical Park: Trading Cards
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Trading Cards              Trading Cards         Civil War Trading Cards featuring stories from Cumberland Gap   Kids! Collect stories about the Civil War and civil rights! The National Park Service is offering more than 500 trading cards to mark the 150th anniversary of the Civil War. Visit a park in person to obtain a card. Ask a ranger or stop by the visitor center at a participating park. You can view all the cards online and discover stories from nearly 90 national parks in 31 states and the District of Columbia. You'll be surprised at what you will learn.
